Object.Name: PosixUser
Object.Description: A posix extension for a generic user

Attribute.Name: test
Attribute.Description: The Audio attribute type allows the storing of sounds in the Directory. The attribute uses a u-law encoded sound file as used by the "play" utility on a Sun 4. This is an interim format

Attribute.Name: groupMembership
Attribute.Description: A list on posix-group names this user is member of

Attribute.Name: shadowLastChange
Attribute.Description: The dat of the last password change.

Attribute.Name: shadowMin
Attribute.Description: The minimum password age is the number of days the user will have to wait before she will be allowed to change her password again.

Attribute.Name: shadowMax
Attribute.Description: The maximum password age is the number of days after which the user will have to change her password.

Attribute.Name: shadowWarning
Attribute.Description: The number of days before a password is going to expire (see the shadowMax) during which the user should be warned.

Attribute.Name: shadowInactive
Attribute.Description: The number of days after a password has expired (see the shadowMax) during which the password should still be accepted (and the user should update her password during the next login).

Attribute.Name: shadowExpire
Attribute.Description: The date of expiration of the account.

Attribute.Name: uidNumber
Attribute.Description: An integer uniquely identifying a user in an administrative domain

Attribute.Name: gidNumber
Attribute.Description: An integer uniquely identifying a group in an administrative domain

Attribute.Name: homeDirectory
Attribute.Description: The absolute path to the home directory

Attribute.Name: loginShell
Attribute.Description: The path to the login shell

Attribute.Name: gecos
Attribute.Description: The GECOS field; the common name
